bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. identical with su xue 宿血① , residual blood. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry she gan 射干： 療 老血在心脾間，咳唾，言語氣臭 , “It cures old blood in the region between heart and spleen, coughing up of spittle, as well as bad odor emitted when one speaks”.

② Pathological Condition identical with su xue 宿血② , residual blood. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry bi jie 萆薢： 主傷中恚怒，陰痿失溺，關節老血 , “It controls harm to the center with rage and anger, dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis] with loss of urine, as well as old blood in the joints”.
